mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GOODS G JOIN SELLER S ON (G.SELLER_NO = S.SELLER_NO) WHERE G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND S.DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM GOODS_SELL WHERE GOOD_NO = #{goodNo} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GOODS_FILE WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT NVL(TRUNC(AVG(STAR_RATING), 1), 0.0) FROM REVIEW R JOIN GOODS G ON (R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE G.GOOD_NO = #{goodNo} AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND M.STATUS IS NULL

SELECT NVL(COUNT(R.REV_NO), 0) FROM REVIEW R JOIN GOODS G ON (R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE G.GOOD_NO = #{goodNo} AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND M.STATUS IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GOODS_SELL WHERE DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND GOOD_NO = #{goodNo}
SELECT * FROM GOODS_FILE WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL
SELECT NVL(COUNT(S.REPLY_NO), 0) FROM SELL_REPLY S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE S.SELL_NO = #{sellNo} AND S.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND M.STATUS IS NULL

SELECT OG.GOOD_NO, G.GOOD_TITLE, OG."COUNT", OG.PRICE, OG.STATUS, S.SELL_NO, F.CHANGE_NAME FROM ORDER_GOODS OG JOIN GOODS G ON (OG.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO) LEFT JOIN GOODS_SELL S ON (G.GOOD_NO = S.GOOD_NO AND S.DELETE_DATE IS NULL) LEFT JOIN GOODS_FILE F ON (S.SELL_NO = F.SELL_NO AND F.CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT G.GOOD_NO, GF.CHANGE_NAME, G.GOOD_TITLE, G.PRICE, G.STOCK, GS.SELL_NO FROM "LIKE" L JOIN GOODS G ON (L.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO AND G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL) LEFT JOIN GOODS_SELL GS ON (G.GOOD_NO = GS.GOOD_NO AND GS.DELETE_DATE IS NULL) LEFT JOIN GOODS_FILE GF ON (GS.SELL_NO = GF.SELL_NO AND GF.CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND GF.DELETE_DATE IS NULL) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT G2.* FROM GOODS G2 WHERE G2.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G2.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} MINUS SELECT G1.* FROM GOODS G1 JOIN GOODS_SELL GS ON (G1.GOOD_NO = GS.GOOD_NO) WHERE G1.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND GS.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G1.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}
